participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and creative, always looking for ways to express myself.
participant_1.background: I enjoy working with my hands and seeing the results of my work. I love dancing. I will study computer science. I used to be very closed off about my sexuality. I'm trying to balance my school work with my social life and my workouts.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and reserved, I find comfort in my hobbies and my home.
participant_2.background: I fear being judged for my physical appearance. I play the flute to bring peace and tranquility to my surroundings. I'm feeling good about my health and my dogs are my best friends. I'm a older woman. My home is my sanctuary, a place where I can relax and be myself.

content.text: Hi! My name is Emily. What's your name?
Hi Emily, my name is Sarah.
It's nice to meet you Sarah! What do you do for fun?
I play the flute and I love to read.
That's great! I love to dance. What do you like to read?
I love to read historical fiction and romance novels.
Oh, me too! I love historical fiction especially.
I know! It's so much fun to learn about different time periods.
What are you reading right now?
I'm reading The Outlander series by Diana Gabaldon.
I've heard good things about that series. I'll have to check it out.
I'm going to go study now. It was nice talking to you, Sarah.
You too, Emily! Have a good day!
